name: Broken Future | Top down shooter
description:
Play this game on full screen!

This is a small top down shooter in an arcade style with small roguelike elements (like random upgrades). Try getting to the highest wave you can and let me know if you have any feedback on itch or on my google form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfr3sGw8DO9eVbT5YsaL3kSFdSl66XSA8lSTu0p...
